name: Healthy Brain to Think Big
description:
To Think Big Brain needs to be Healthy.In this Game Keep your Brain Healthy by avoiding Drugs and earn extra Brain Points by collecting Books and Ideas.Player will get 3 Lifes since starting.Drugs can eliminate 1 Life of player everytime it collides/consumed by player.Books will add +1 brain point to player score.Ideas can add +5 brain points to player's Score.As this is my first game and first game jam there might be some bugs in the game.

I hope you all enjoy it Playing!!!
